'''Apple''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in ''[[Star-Seeker's Sojourn]]''. She is a [[Rishboland Tiger]] pet owned by [[Shalmar]] and [[Banu]].

==Profile==
Apple's history and how she came to be a pet in [[Banu]]'s family is unknown.

===Personality===
Apple is friendly toward [[Banu]] and her family and friends, including the [[Traveler]]'s party. However, according to Banu's father [[Shalmar]], she only listens to Banu and her mother. Apple is fiercely protective of her family. Shalmar asked Apple to follow [[Banu]] discreetly to ensure that no harm came to her. When Banu and the player are accosted by some fungi, Apple shows up and assists in the fight.

===Appearance===
Apple looks like a typical [[Rishboland Tiger]].
